text: Pamela Ann Melroy (born September 17, 1961) is a retired United States Air Force officer and a former NASA astronaut. She was the Deputy Administrator of NASA from 2021 until 2025 during the Joe Biden administration. She served as pilot on Space Shuttle missions STS-92 and STS-112 and commanded mission STS-120 before leaving the agency in August 2009. Melroy will be inducted into the United States Astronaut Hall of Fame at the Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:American astronauts Category:Living people Category:Scientists from California Category:Politicians from California Category:Engineers from California Category:Military people from California Category:People from Palo Alto, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Pamela Melroy
